titleStmt.title: A consolacyon for chrysten people to repayre agayn the lordes temple with certayne places of scrypture truely applyed to satysfye theyr myndes for ye expellyng of ydolatry, [et] to instruct the[m], of loue and obedience. Compyled by nycholas wyse
titleStmt.author: Wyse, Nicholas.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Waylande with in Temple barre at the sygne of the blewe garland,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; lacks leaves I3 and I4.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: Temple barre at the sygne of the blewe garland
